titles.title: Expressing support for designation of May 30 as "National Bartter Syndrome Day".
Expressing support for designation of May 30 as "National Bartter Syndrome Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Bartter Syndrome Day. (Bartter syndrome is caused by genetic defects that affect kidney function. Symptoms include muscle weakness and growth delay.)
